text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali recommends implementation of programmes of vocational training to help modernise the economy.

- Tunisia negotiating the export of 15,000 tonnes of tomato puree to the European Union. Tomato production reached a record 540,000 tonnes this year. Tomato puree production expected to reach 98,000 tonnes.
- President Ben Ali recommends more efforts to limit road accidents.
